actions.committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

official_title: A bill to amend the National Trails System Act by designating the Pacific Northwest Scenic Trail, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends the National Trails System Act to designate as a national scenic trail the Pacific Northwest Scenic Trail extending from Cape Alava, Washington, to Glacier Park, Montana.

titles.title: A bill to amend the National Trails System Act by designating the Pacific Northwest Scenic Trail, and for other purposes.
